summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Genesee Street, from Rainier Avenue to 38th Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the north side thereof; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7601 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
